summary: The FBI Animal Cruelty Taskforce Act of 2025 proposes the establishment of an Animal Cruelty Crimes Taskforce within the FBI. This taskforce will investigate and enforce federal laws against animal cruelty, including dogfighting, cockfighting, and crush videos. It will also create training materials for local law enforcement and coordinate with various federal agencies. The taskforce is required to submit annual reports to Congress detailing charges, convictions, and investigations related to these offenses.
